channel.title: Unit Testing on Documentation for Umuzi Tech Department
channel.description: Recent content in Unit Testing on Documentation for Umuzi Tech Department

item.title: Animals Part 2. Adding Tests
item.description: In this challenge you will update your current Animals project and add unit tests to the project Project structure Java The code you push to git should have the following structure: ├── build.gradle ├── gradle │ └── wrapper │ ├── gradle-wrapper.jar │ └── gradle-wrapper.properties ├── gradlew ├── gradlew.bat ├── settings.gradle └── src ├── main | └── java | ├── Animal.java <-------- names are important | ├── Cat.java <-------- names are important | ├── Dog.
